blur_detection.description: The receipt exhibits clear, sharp text with well-defined edges and minimal blur.
blur_detection.recommendation: No action required as text clarity is sufficient for OCR processing.

contrast_assessment.description: The receipt shows excellent contrast between the dark text and white background throughout the document.
contrast_assessment.recommendation: No contrast adjustment needed for effective data extraction.

glare_identification.description: The receipt shows minimal glare with very slight reflections that do not impact text readability.
glare_identification.recommendation: No action required as existing minor reflections don't affect data extraction.

water_stains.description: No water stains, discoloration, or water damage evident on the receipt.
water_stains.recommendation: No action required as document is free from water damage.

tears_or_folds.description: The receipt has a visible curl along its length but no tears or significant folds that impact text legibility.
tears_or_folds.recommendation: No action required as the natural curl of thermal paper doesn't impact data extraction.

cut_off_detection.description: All receipt edges are visible with no content appearing to be cut off.
cut_off_detection.recommendation: No action required as all content is visible within the frame.

missing_sections.description: The receipt appears complete with all standard sections including header, line items, and total.
missing_sections.recommendation: No action required as receipt contains all expected components.

obstructions.description: Fingers visible holding the receipt at the left edge but not obscuring any important textual content.
obstructions.recommendation: No action required as the fingers don't obstruct any relevant receipt information.
